short_summary: 5P468-23-0225/A Pedestrian Crossing – Rouge Urban National Park
description: Procure the Installation of a pedestrian crossover on Twyn Rivers Drive for trail connections from the Twyn Rivers Day Use Area.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Invitation to Qualify
We invite qualified bidders to submit their qualifications for the Stage 1 tender for the Pedestrian Crossing in Rouge National Urban Park, which is part of the 5P468-23-0225/A project.

#### Project Overview
Parks Canada requires the installation of a pedestrian crossover on Twyn Rivers Drive for trail connections from the Twyn Rivers Day Use Area. The estimated project value is between $100,001 and $250,000 (taxes extra).

#### Submission Guidelines
Bidders are required to submit their qualifications in two stages. Stage 1 involves evaluating the qualifications of interested suppliers, while Stage 2 invites qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on specified specifications and drawings.

#### Important Details
* Bidders must submit their qualifications via fax or email. Submissions sent via SAP Ariba will not be accepted.
* The submission deadline is March 5, 2024, at 14:00:00.
* Enquiries regarding technical and contractual matters must be submitted in writing no later than 5 calendar days prior to the submission deadline.
* Contact Information:
	+ Rylan Madge (Contracting Authority): rylan.madge@pc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (613) 371-3685
	+ Fax: (855) 983-1808

#### Requirements
* Bidders must demonstrate their experience and qualifications for the project.
* Bidders must provide a detailed report on their qualifications, including a description of their company, their experience in relevant fields, and a list of their relevant projects and references.

#### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for this tender are based on the lowest price.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:
Rylan Madge, Contracting Authority
rylan.madge@pc.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 371-3685
Fax: (855) 983-1808

#### Technical Specifications
The technical specifications for this project are available in the attached documents.

#### Notice of Invitation to Qualify
This is a two-stage selection process, and bidders responding to this invitation must submit their qualifications in two stages. The first stage will evaluate the qualifications of interested suppliers, while the second stage will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.
